items.sentence: He got up quickly, splashed cold water on his face, brushed his teeth, and shaved.
I wish I could be more optimistic, but I don\'t think things will get better soon.
The kitchen knife wasn\'t sharp enough to cut the meat, so I used my pocket knife.
Falling in love with Tom was probably the biggest mistake that Mary had ever made.
Tom thinks that he\'s Mary\'s boyfriend, but Mary thinks that he\'s just a friend.
